house.title: The House
house.overview_description: Geairas House is a beautiful 3-bedroom villa located in the charming area of Gaeiras, Portugal. With stunning ocean views and a spacious exterior, it's the perfect retreat for families and friends.
house.overview_description2: The house features modern amenities while maintaining a cozy atmosphere that will make you feel right at home during your stay.
house.master_bedroom_desc: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and ocean views.
house.second_bedroom_desc: Comfortable bedroom with queen-size bed and private balcony.
house.third_bedroom_desc: Cozy bedroom with twin beds, perfect for children or guests.

exterior.pool_desc: Large private pool with sun loungers and parasols.
exterior.jacuzzi_desc: Relaxing jacuzzi with stunning ocean views.
exterior.bbq_desc: Modern BBQ grill with outdoor dining area.
exterior.garden_desc: Landscaped garden with local plants and relaxation areas.

location.title: Location
location.gaeiras_description: Gaeiras is a charming parish located in the municipality of Óbidos, in the Oeste region of central Portugal. This picturesque area offers a perfect blend of rural tranquility and proximity to beautiful beaches.
location.gaeiras_description2: The area is known for its vineyards, orchards, and stunning landscapes. It's an ideal base for exploring the historic town of Óbidos and the beautiful Silver Coast beaches.

beach_distance.title: Beaches
beach_distance.description: 10km to nearest beaches (Praia d'El Rey, Baleal)

obidos.name: Óbidos Medieval Town
obidos.description: Explore this historic walled town with its narrow streets, traditional houses, and medieval castle.

beach.name: Silver Coast Beaches
beach.description: Enjoy the beautiful beaches of Portugal's Silver Coast, perfect for surfing and relaxation.

buddha.name: Buddha Eden Garden
buddha.description: Visit Europe's largest oriental garden with Buddha statues, pagodas, and terracotta statues.

lagoon.name: Óbidos Lagoon
lagoon.description: Discover this natural lagoon perfect for water sports, bird watching, and scenic walks.

plane.title: By Plane
plane.description: Fly to Lisbon Airport, then rent a car or take a taxi to Gaeiras (approx. 1 hour drive).

car.title: By Car
car.description: From Lisbon, take the A8 highway north towards Leiria, then exit at Óbidos and follow signs to Gaeiras.

bus.title: By Bus
bus.description: Regular bus services connect Lisbon to Óbidos. From there, take a local taxi to Gaeiras.
